long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can finally X out of those tabs!

With Tab Saver, you to save your tabs for later and load your saved tabs whever you need them.

To save your tabs for later, create a new profile by clicking "New profile", typing the name of the profile in the box, and click Add! It will automatically save all of the windows and tabs you have open in that profile. 

To get your tabs back, click the profile in your list of profiles and click "Load Profile" or "Switch Profile". BOOM all of your old tabs are back!

Load Profile will open all of your old windows / tabs.
Switch profile will X out of all of your tabs as well as load the profile.

Other Functions:
To delete a profile click on the profile in your list and click "Delete Profile".
To overwrite a profile with your current windows / tabs, click on the profile in the list and click "Overwrite Profile".


Future updates will address:
Y2K style UI
Does not save current work done in a tab (only saves url)
Tabs do not sync across devices and are local to your machine
